title: Draven draven skin legacy chest?
body: Are you able to get the draven draven skin in the legacy chests?

replies.body: I got draven draven re-rolling 3 skins :v

Yup, you can certainly *potentially* get it from a Chest, but you'd have to be really lucky! You can find a lot of the Legacy skins listed in [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins), in case you were curious about any other skins.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

Will the legacy vault open perhaps on christmas day/eve for those seeking something specific?

[Looks like it's Legacy](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/draven-day-2016), so it should be fair game for Legacy Chests!

You'll be so lucky if you get it. It's a 5000 RP skin, so Skin Shards should be worth 1/3 of that price in Cosmetic Essence...

Then again, if you plan on Enchanting it, it will take a _lot_ of Cosmetic Essence.
